string.value: You need to find the stolen Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire and take it to #b#p1300003##k.
I…actually have something that I'd like for you to look for on my behalf.

When King Pepe invaded our castle, we were so busy trying to evacuate from the premises that I couldn't find the Royal Seal that was supposed to be locked inside the castle's safe. The Royal Seal is the symbol of our kingdom, and I can't imagine who would have stolen it from us. Please find it for me…

If that Royal Seal turns out to be in King Pepe's possession, then it'll allow him to officially announce the wedding between his son and Princess Violetta, not to mention take over of the Empire. The only ones who have the authority to open the safe are #bMushking#k himself, #bVioletta#k, the #bPrime Minister#k and myself... Anyway, we must find that Royal Seal at once.
Please think about it and reconsider. The future of our Empire is at stake.
You found the Royal Seal! Thank you so much!

Yes… I have heard. Never in my life did I suspect that our very own #bPrime Minister#k would have been behind this. He was such a noble, loyal man, but he was blinded by his greed. Anyway, now that we have the Royal Seal back, our job is to restore the Empire to its original state.
The Royal Seal is the symbol of our Empire. We must retrieve it at once!
